slides.title: 2022 Strategic Sales and Negotiation Skills Course
2022 Integrity Management and Insider Trading Prevention

paragraphs: The company highly values employee training and development programs with a vision of growing alongside employees with long-term goals. Therefore, career planning and development opportunities are offered to help employees set long-term career goals and directions. Opportunities for internal transfers and job rotation within the company allow employees to explore new career paths, including cross-departmental and international transfers.

If the company faces organizational restructuring or layoffs, adaptive training and support, such as career transition training and job counseling, are provided to ensure a smooth transition for employees into new environments.

Our talent development system not only focuses on education and training itself but also on employees' career development and welfare. Related policies often include salary benefits, career development plans, work flexibility, and employee care and support, ensuring comprehensive support and security for employees' learning and growth, in line with our 'people-oriented' corporate culture.

Upholding the talent cultivation philosophy of 'Learning Together, Growing Together,' the company focuses on employees' professional skills and career development by offering diverse internal training programs, including professional skills training, management training, language training, and advanced executive training tailored to meet the different skills and professional needs of managers and general employees. Employees are also encouraged to participate in external professional courses and seminars to gain knowledge and skills. A total of 3,527 hours of training was provided to employees at all levels in 2023.

Training is tailored to employees' roles and functions and may include technical training, industry certification courses, professional development, leadership training, and cross-departmental collaboration. Soft skills such as cross-cultural communication, problem-solving abilities, and creative thinking are also enhanced to improve overall employee competencies.

To avoid making training a mere formality or detached from corporate goals, we base our training on business goals and development strategies, providing talent development and consulting services based on actual needs to establish the company as a 'learning organization' that continually innovates and improves.

Future training plans will focus on multiple areas, including technology, professional knowledge, leadership, and soft skills. Key areas will include emerging technologies, data analytics, and digital transformation to meet the organization's future needs.

cards.title: Educational Training
cards.text: Emphasizes 'Benchmark Learning' with an open and receptive mindset to learn best practices, shared technical guidance, management skills, and product/service development trends both within and outside the industry, maximizing learning impact toward strategic goals.

cards.title: Mentorship
cards.text: Focuses on 'Supportive Education,' providing deep guidance and consultation from experienced professionals within different fields, reducing learning gaps and improving learning paths.

cards.title: Expert Development
cards.text: Focuses on 'In-Depth Development,' enabling colleagues to continuously advance in their professions through competency development to improve job performance and strengthen the company's overall competitive advantage.

cards.title: Cultural Development
cards.text: Emphasizes the cultivation of organizational values, corporate culture, and ethics to foster employee alignment with the organization, encouraging a positive work attitude and team spirit.

cards.title: Professional Development
cards.text: Enhances employees' skills and knowledge in their professional fields, ensuring they can continuously grow and excel.

cards.title: Leadership Development
cards.text: Targets management-level personnel, fostering leadership abilities, interpersonal skills, and decision-making competencies.

cards.title: Competency Development
cards.text: Supports employees in enhancing their workplace abilities and competitiveness.
